title: Salesforce MTS Offer
content:
Experience : 3 years 6 months
Current Company : Fintech company (2 yrs)
Current Salary : 23.5 LPA base + 10% bonus
First Company : One of "very well known" product based MNCs (1 yr 6 months , PPO from internship; was put on Focus in the end :( )
Salesforce Role : MTS
Salesforce Salary : 31.5 LPA Base + 10% bonus + 1.5 Lakh Relocation bonus + 48k RSU vested for 4 years
Leetcode stats : Guardian and solved 1600+ problems

I tried to negotiate a lot with the recruiter but then senior recruiter called me today and told me to take the offer or leave it after explaining "HR" things; they won't offer more. And also I am not very good at negotiating. 

Also they told I've to join by 31st Jan but I have 2 months notice period so I've to opt out for Notice Period Buy Out.

Neither do I have any competiting offers. Interview with Google and PhonePe are in progress; got Hire, Hire/Strong Hire, Strong Hire in the three tech rounds in Google, and behaviour round will happen next week. Phonepe HLD round is also scheduled next week.

I am definitely getting low balled at Salesforce and if they force me to accept the Offer Letter by 1-2 days (when I joined my current company, they also did the same) then I won't be able to give interview at other places.

But also I cannot reject the offer letter because the relationship between me and my team lead has become really sour and its been affecting my mental health for a long time. 

It would be really helpful if someone has any suggestion.

I will add interview questions later in a separate post.
